reason: Move to the starfruit first, as it is positioned close to the target mug and may obstruct grasping if not cleared.
Lower the arm to the working height to prepare for pulling the starfruit away from the target.
Pull the starfruit toward the robot base to move it away from the target mug area.
Continue pulling the starfruit to ensure it is sufficiently far from the target mug.
Lift the arm to a safe height after clearing the starfruit, preparing to approach the target for grasping.
Reset the hand to the default open posture to ensure proper finger configuration before grasping the mug.
The starfruit has been cleared from the workspace. Attempt to grasp the target mug now.
The arm may be in a suboptimal configuration after the grasp attempt. Reset it to the default posture.
Lift the arm to a safe height after resetting the arm posture.
Reset the hand posture to prepare for another grasp attempt with a fresh configuration.
Make another grasp attempt on the target mug with refreshed arm and hand configuration.
Lift the arm to confirm the mug has been successfully picked up.
The target (mug) has been successfully grasped. The task is complete.
